name: Rainbow Fish
description:
Theme: Unseen

Description: The goal of the game is to shoot the boss when the enemies doesn't see you, only when you shoot they see you. It is a bullet hell prototype game,  demonstrating when the player is invisible the Enemy AI won't go after you but only go to the last known location. The Big Fish is the boss while the little ones are the enemies, the enemies will be spawned only if the Big fish is alive. 

HINT: Try to dodge once you kill the boss early on otherwise it's gameover.

How To Play:  WASD - Movement,  Mouse Left Click - Shoot,  Mouse - Aim
